title: The Baron Steal: FNC Broxah -- "On the second [Baron steal], after you steal one already, you're like, 'Okay, this is going to be easy.'"

replies.body: edit for {{summoner:13}} : "As soon as it turns red" -> "As soon as it turns green"
this article is funnier in retrospect after the semis vs  RNG. choked every dragon/baron.
{{champion:412}} funny, i never heard any jg can let three dragons which are supposed to belong to urs stolen by others. Practice more, stop finding excuse. More excuse, more reason why lose.

I always enjoyed watching Saintvicious.  He was the pro that inspired me to jungle.  When he was on team Gravity was when he seemed happiest, as they always had their own style and gameplay that was different from the meta, but that was something of their own.  Hit itemization was great and shotcalling was top notch imho.
